entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR: AllowAnonymous and Authorize don't play well together under Windows authentication #41139
  • Allow knowing before render if `RenderFragment<T>` will return null or empty #41138
  • Add the code in Counter.razor, press Ctrl + F5 then delete this code, error "ENC0033 Deleting auto-property 'IncrementAmount' requires restarting the application" pop up #41133
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_NoOrDelayed_Available_Ignored #41131
    Test failures
  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130

Closed

  • Change EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext classes to use constructors to set property values #41117
    7.0-preview4
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-114719-.NET6 #37620
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-113594-.NET7 #37473
  • SignalR client should send keepalive ping immediately when connected #41081
  • Add header `Request-Context` to class Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers.HeaderNames #41084
  • SetCookieHeaderValue - System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.InplaceStringBuilder' #40255
  • Results<T1, TN> union types should implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41097
    7.0-preview4
  • Build template packages in servicing #40637
  • Template 'ASP.NET Core Web App' adds unnecessary usings to Startup.cs #41114
  • HTTP/3: Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41042
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor app.razor NotFound not authorizing #41113
  • [Question] `HttpContext.TraceIdentifier` vs `Activity.Current.Id` #39873
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add redis startup error handling #41141
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • USe Project References #41137
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #41136
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add ctors to EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext #41116
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `a1cc8c5` #41135
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41123
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Make Results<TResult1, TResultN> union types implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41109
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine recently failing tests #41132
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
